[[Image:Assaultteam.JPG|231px|thumb|right|The Star Fox team; from left to right- [[List of characters in the Star Fox series#Slippy Toad|Slippy Toad]], [[Fox McCloud]], [[List of characters in the Star Fox series#Falco Lombardi|Falco Lombardi]], and [[List of characters in the Star Fox series#Krystal|Krystal]]]]
 
{{main|List of characters in the Star Fox series}}
{{main|List of characters in the Star Fox series}}
''Star Fox: Assault'' takes place in the Lylat system, a location featured in the previous games. All of the planets visited in the game, with the exception of the Aparoid Homeworld, have been seen in previous titles. Fortuna is shown in its original form as a separate planet from Fichina. Venom, prominently featured in past installments, is not seen.
